Name: Bizarre Mutation World
About the game: Klorofit is a human plant hybrid that has intelligence and mobility. It is an organism that was created in the laboratory by a team of scientists, who have already passed away. These scientists chose a strange world, where the night never ends, to carry out their experiments. Klorofit noticited that his pet, Zurul, is getting sick because of the genetic mutation that is taking place in its body. This mutation comes from its connection to the strange tree. He realizes that the enigmatic objects can heal his friend, but he'll need to use his intelligence to avoid falling into traps. All he wants is to see his friend free from suffering and from genetic mutation.
